audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Education

name: VocabDrill
summary: Vocabulary Drills geared to Standardized Tests
short_description:
VocabDrill allows a student to drill in English word vocabulary. The focus is on standardized tests like PSAT, SAT, GMAT, etc. 

There are many similar packages. Where VocabDrill is unique is in the help it provides to the student in the form of analysis of strengths and weaknesses. The focus is to make the drill efficient by suppressing words the student knows and moving ahead based on the current level of ability.
